name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Monitoring natural attenuation ; Soil risk control ; 50 years ; Only considering personnel transportation
修复后土壤;监测自然衰减;土壤风险管控;50年;仅考虑人员运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 对于MNA，假设污染物将在50年内降解，因此监测时间设定为50年。自然衰减是由于生物降解或化学降解、稀释、分散、挥发和吸附的自然过程。应用自然衰减作为修复备选方案需要仔细评估许多场地参数，如水文、污染物分布、命运、地球化学和受体位置。长期监测是自然衰减方法的一个组成部分，其中收集的数据用于评估污染物随时间的行为、自然衰减的效率，以及验证下游受体的风险。降解速度很慢，有时可能需要几百年才能达到标准。因此，本研究中使用的50年仅视为对时间的简单估计。

MNA is assumed that the contaminants will degrade in a period of 50 years, hence the monitoring time. Natural attenuation is a process of risk reduction at the site due to the natural course of biodegradation or chemical degradation, dilution, dispersion, volatilization and sorption. Application of natural attenuation as a remedial alternative needs careful evaluation of a number of site parameters such as hydrology, contaminant distribution, fate, geochemistry and receptor location. Long-term monitoring is an integral part of a natural attenuation approach where the collected data is used for evaluation of contaminant behavior with time, efficiency of natural attenuation, and verification of the risk to down gradient receptors. The degradation rate is slow and can sometimes take a few hundred years to reach a regulatory standard. Therefore, the 50-year timeframe used in this study should be seen as only a working estimate of time.

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is defined as remediation of 5000 yd 3 of soil. The design of the treatment options is generic, and lacks parameters such as site characteristics, hydrology and efficiency of technology.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This study used a hypothetical site and did not specify the location of the site, therefore the author's area was used as the site location: Newark, the United States
本研究使用的是一个假设的场地，且没有明确场地所在位置，因此采用作者所在的区域作为场地位置，即美国Newark

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Only incuding Long-term monitoring, 2 workers/month for monitoring.For personal transportation of workers, the distance from home to work-site was assumed to be 30 km.
仅包括长期监测，2名工人/月进行监测。对于工人的个人交通，从家到工作地点的距离假设为30km。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset is used for understanding and modeling the process of monitoring natural attenuation of contaminants in remediated soil over a period of 50 years. It simulates a scenario where long-term monitoring is conducted to assess the risk control and degradation of soil pollutants, taking into account only the personal transportation of workers for the site located in Newark, USA. The designed usage includes evaluation of the site parameters such as hydrology, contaminant distribution, and geochemistry, and it is applicable to environmental engineers and professionals involved in soil remediation projects.
此数据集用于理解和模拟在50年时间内对修复后土壤中污染物的自然衰减进行监测的过程。它模拟了一个场景，其中进行长期监测以评估土壤污染物降解和风险控制，并且仅考虑工人的人员运输，监测地点位于美国纽瓦克。设计用途包括评估场地参数，如水文、污染物分布和地球化学，适用于环境工程师和参与土壤修复项目的专业人员。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Dhaliwal, Harnoor, "Sustainable site remediation : a life cycle assessment approach" (2009). Theses. 296.
Dhaliwal, Harnoor, "Sustainable site remediation : a life cycle assessment approach" (2009). Theses. 296.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset, data users must note that the treatment of soil remediation reflected in the data is based on a hypothetical site and a generic treatment design. Care must be taken to adapt the dataset to real-world conditions, including actual site characteristics and treatment efficiencies. The transportation element is solely for the purpose of monitoring and does not include any other aspects of the soil remediation process. The 50-year timeframe is a rough estimate, and in practice, monitoring may be required for a shorter or longer period depending on actual contaminant degradation rates.
使用此数据集时，数据用户必须注意，数据中反映的土壤修复处理基于假设的场地和通用处理设计。使用时必须注意将数据集适应于现实世界条件，包括实际的场地特性和处理效率。运输环节仅用于监测目的，不包括土壤修复过程的其他方面。50年的时间框架为粗略估计，在实践中，根据实际污染物降解速率，可能需要更短或更长的监测时间。

completeness.common:other: For MNA only transportation for monitoring was considered.
对于监测自然衰减，仅考虑监测过程中的运输环节

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 功能单元定义为5000 yd 3土壤的修复（1yd3等于0.764554857984立方米,即修复方量约为3822.77 m3）。
